A '''red sandstone slab''' is a [[red sandstone]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Red sandstone slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Red Sandstone Slab
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Note blocks ===
Red sandstone slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
